fields.name: Actions
fields.description: Actions that are performed when the alert rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.

fields.name: Annotations
fields.description: The annotations clause specifies a set of informational labels that can be used to store longer additional information such as alert descriptions or runbook links. The annotation values can be templated.

fields.name: Expression
fields.description: The PromQL expression to evaluate. https://prometheus.io/docs/prometheus/latest/querying/basics/. Evaluated periodically as given by 'interval', and the result recorded as a new set of time series with the metric name as given by 'record'.

fields.name: For
fields.description: The amount of time alert must be active before firing.

fields.name: Labels
fields.description: Labels to add or overwrite before storing the result.

fields.name: ResolveConfiguration
fields.description: Defines the configuration for resolving fired alerts. Only relevant for alerts.

fields.name: Severity
fields.description: The severity of the alerts fired by the rule. Must be between 0 and 4.
